participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and nurturing, with a passion for animals and a love for sports.
participant_1.background: I have never been in a fight, but I would defend myself if I had to. My mother was a piano teacher. I was a stay-at-home mom when my kids were little. I am a girl who loves sports cars and video games. I took my cats to the farm and let them play with the pigs, horses and hens.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Practical and nature-loving, dedicated to his career while cherishing the beauty of the outdoors.
participant_2.background: I'm more into my career than getting married. I think about the beauty of nature and how lucky I am to experience it with my dog. I owe 2 monitors for work. I live on a ranch. My laundry schedule is based on the amount of running I do that week.

content.text: I love horses! I used to take my cats to the farm to play with the horses!
Oh cool! I love horses too. I grew up on a ranch so I've been around horses my whole life.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to live on a ranch!
It's really great. I love being outside and working with the animals.
I can imagine! It sounds like a lot of hard work, but also very rewarding.
It is, but it's worth it. I love my life on the ranch.
I'm glad! What's your favorite thing about living on a ranch?
I love being able to be outside all the time and working with the animals. I also love the peace and quiet.
That sounds amazing. I wish I could live on a ranch.
You should! It's a great way to live.
